name: Preloader by WordPress Monsters
author: WordPress Monsters

sections.description:
When your website is taking too much time to respond, the best solution is to install a Preloader. It is a beautiful animated image that will help users to relax until the site respond, because they won’t see website loading process. You can find a lot of cute preloaders, especially in “With background” section.

This plugin provides:

  • More than 100 beautiful preloaders
  • Possibility to upload your own preloader
  • Possibility to set time and your preloader will be active even if the page has loaded
  • Possibility to set preloader only for the homepage
  • Easy to use and simple to config
  • Cross-browser & responsive
sections.installation:
1. Upload preloader-sws to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings -> Preloader SWS
  4. Select a preloader and save your choice
  5. That’s all! You don’t need to paste some code to your templates. Preloader is already on the website!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload preloader-sws to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings -> Preloader SWS
  4. Select a preloader and save your choice
  5. That’s all! You don’t need to paste some code to your templates. Preloader is already on the website!

I want a lot of new preloaders in your plugin! Especially for black background(for example). Are you going to add something new?

Of course! If I find something beautiful, I’ll add that to this plugin. If you have something to offer please contact me through the contact form on this site – http://www.wpmonsters.org/. I will add that!
sections.changelog:
1.2.3

  • Changed name of plugin
  • Deleted extra files from plugin
  • Changed description

1.2.2

  • Fixed first save bugs & variable notices

1.2.1

  • Fixed preview bugs in admin panel
  • Fixed formalization at wordpress.org

1.2

  • Added new option “Activate only for frontpage”

1.1

  • Added more than 30 preloaders
  • Added possibility to preview preloaders in plugin options page
  • Added new settings section. And the first setting: delay time after page loaded

1.0

  • First release

short_description: When your pages are getting too much time to load, add Preloader to your website. This plugin provides various cool preloaders (100+).
